briefTitle: IORT-Boost-Study, Prospective Observational Study for Intraoperative Radiotherapy of the Breast as a Boost
officialTitle: Prospective Observational Study for Intraoperative Radiotherapy (IORT) of the Breast as a Boost
primaryOutcomeMeasure: number of Participants with local recurrence histologically proven
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women with histologically proven unifocal ductal-invasive or other histology of breast-cancer, size of tumor \< or = 3.5 cm
* written informed consent
* ability to cooperate
* full legal capability

Exclusion Criteria:

* missing written informed consent
* lack of compliance
